author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 15-year-old school girl committed suicide on Friday by hanging at her home in MMDA Colony, Arumbakkam.

The student has been identified as Shenbaga Sadhurshana, a class X student of a private school. The body has been sent to the Government Kilpauk Medical College Hospital. Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline can be reached at 044-24640050/ 60.
title: School student commits suicide
